channel.title: Free From Captivity | Blog Talk Radio Feed
channel.description: Just as God delivered the nation of Israel out of captivity. God desires for you to be free also. Spiritual freedom is a gift available to all God's children. Get FREE FROM CAPTIVITY and receive restoration and healing from all that afflicts you. Spiritual warfare on all levels. Deliverance from all demonic forces.

item.title: You Need To Get Free - With James Alford - Mar 15,2012
item.description:
Many times in life we go through struggles and pains and can never get beyond them....So we decide to just cope and embrace our captivity...But God has said that he desires that you be free. Free from troubles, free from worry, free from doubt. Tune in learn to identify issues that have you trapped and get your breakthrough. James Alford. www.freefromcaptivity.com.

item.title: Discerning Evil And Good - Free From Captivity- James Alford - Mar 11,2012
item.description:
One thing that plagues most Christians is that they are not effectively able to discern evil and good. Satan uses this lack of spiritual awareness to decieve the masses. He is able to introduce exotic doctrines and false prophets right upper under most peoples noses. If we are going to fight the good fight of faith we have to exercise our senses and become mature Christians. Listen and learn about discerning good and evil with Host James Alford. www.freefromcaptivity.com

deliverance | discernment | power of jesus | love | bible study

item.title: Spiritual Warfare - The Power Of Testimony - Jan 26,2012
item.description:
Your testimony is instrumental in establishing a faith walk with God. Many times we can not move forward in the things of God because we dont have faith and the things that God has done for us in the past are quickly forgotten. You have to use your testimony as a weapon to overcome the works of the devil and walk in divine victory. Broadcast Overview: Spiritual teachings and prayer for all those who desire. Direct confrontation of spiritual forces and release of all those oppressed by various demonic forces. Christian teachings based on the scripture of " if the son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed" John 8:36. Tune in and call us! Get free...get your breakthrough right now. www.freefromcaptivity.com

Jesus | Deliverance | Truth | Restoration | Healing

item.title: The Power Of Two- www.freefromcaptivity.cm - Jan 12,2012
item.description:
The words of Jesus solidified the power of two when he stated he would be where two or more were gathered. From the beginning of time God worked to use the power of two coming together to do his will. Marriage is a great covenant that uses the power of two. This is why Satan has tried so hard to destroy christian marriages. Dont let the devil destroy the dynamic power of two coming together in your family. Get free from the quiet spirit that works to sow seeds of division. www.freefromcaptivity.com

spiritual | religion | marriage | salvation | deliverance

item.title: Spiritual Warfare- The Weapons (Freefromcaptivity.com) - Jan 05,2012
item.description:
So many times, we as Christians go into battle without any true weapons. The bible is clear... "For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds". If your are going to fight the devil and be victorious you cannot not fight with flesh and blood but with the power Jesus Christ gave us. Spiritual teachings and prayer for all those who desire. Direct confrontation of spiritual forces and release of all those oppressed by various demonic forces. Christian teachings based on the scripture of " if the son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed" John 8:36. Tune in and call us! Get free...get your breakthrough right now. www.freefromcaptivity.com
